headline: Dayforce Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Results1
summary: Dayforce® recurring revenue of $347.9 million, up 19% year-over-year in the fourth quarter Total revenue of $465.2 million, up 16% year-over-year in the fourth quarter Full year 2024 net cash provided by operating activities of $281.1 million, up 28% Annual Dayforce gross revenue retention rate of 98% MINNEAPOLIS and TORONTO, Feb. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dayforce, Inc.
